plot: The Yellow Card is a personal documentary that shows the lives and musical work of musicians who spend their lives in the subway stations of New York City. It portrays the story of two main musicians, exploring their lives and work of Art.
title: The Yellow Card
plot_es: The Yellow Card is a personal documentary that shows the lives and musical work of musicians who spend their lives in the subway stations of New York City. It portrays the story of two main musicians, exploring their lives and work of Art.
